title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6.7 - Executive order no. 7: continuation of prior executive orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6.7 - Executive order no. 7: continuation of prior executive orders

State Regulations
WHEREAS, Executive Order No. 5, issued January 1, 2007
directed the continuation of certain Executive Orders and amendments thereto in
effect as of that date; and
WHEREAS, Executive Order No. 5 further directed that a
review of prior Executive Orders shall continue; and
WHEREAS, a further review has been completed of those

Executive Orders and amendments thereto that were in effect prior to January 1, 2007; and
WHEREAS, during the course of that review, it has been
determined that certain Executive Orders address ongoing issues and should be
continued; and
WHEREAS, it is important to identify for the public those

Executive Orders that remain in effect; NOW, THEREFORE, I, Eliot Spitzer, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and the
laws of the State of New York, do hereby order that upon due consideration, deliberation and review, the Executive Orders set forth below and any
amendments thereto shall be deemed to have been in full force and effect since

January 1, 2007, and shall remain in full force and effect until otherwise
revoked, superseded or modified; and
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that a review of prior Executive

Orders shall continue to determine whether additional orders should be
continued, revoked, superseded or modified. EXECUTIVE ORDERS BEING CONTINUED
A. Executive Orders of Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller

Executive Order No. 42, issued October 14, 1970 (Relating
to Procedures for Submission and Settlement of Certain Grievances of State

Employees)
B. Executive

Orders of Governor Mario M. Cuomo

Executive Order No. 56, issued December 20, 1984
(Establishing the New York State Task Force on Life and the Law)
C. Executive Orders of Governor

George E. Pataki

Executive Order No. 43, issued September 23, 1996
(Directing the Establishment of a Pilot Project for Urban Search and Rescue in
the Capital Region)

Executive Order No. 134, issued January 5, 2005 (Directing

State Agencies to Reduce the Environmental Impact of Cleaning of State

Facilities)

Signed: Eliot SpitzerDated: February 12, 2007
[FN*] [Revoked by Executive Order No. 9 (David A. Paterson), infra.]
[Revoked by Executive Order No. 2 (Andrew M. Cuomo), infra.]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

6.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
